thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Sharon Cheverie

author: Sharon Cheverie
title: Sharon Cheverie
text: Needed to call Flight Direct in order to use/process my flight drop protection that I wasn't able to process from my screen. I was dealt with understanding in a timely manner. Needed to call back after booking to finish my request with my booking number... was able to talk to the same representative which really helped. Felt the whole experience went rather smooth...compared to my last experience dealing with Flight Network directly in the past.
